regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return r = re.findall('(?s)class="competition".*?title="Buffstreams([^"]*)"\s*href="([^"]*).*?score">\s*([^<]*)\n.', page_data) return r

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,requests #e = re.findall('var streamsMatchId\s*=\s*([^;]*)',page_data)[0] #r = re.findall('var streamsSport\s*=\s*"([^;"]*)',page_data)[0] #t = requests.get('https://scdn.dev/main-assets/' + e + '/' + r + '?origin=reddit.nbabite.com', headers={'user-agent':'iPad','referer':'https://reddit.nbabite.com'}).text #t = t.split('Fubo',1)[-1] t = requests.get('[makelist.param2]').text x = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*).*?platinum">([^<]*)',t) z = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*).*?silver">([^<]*)',t) sort = [(client.tinyl(i[0]) ,i[1],i[2],i[3]) for i in x if 'Platinum'in i[2] if 'p2pstreams' not in i[0] if 'sportinglive' not in i[0] if 'DAZN' not in i[1] if 'ripplestream4u' not in i[0] if 'espnonline' not in i[0] if 'papahd' not in i[0] if 'stakes100' not in i[0] if 'cr8soccer' not in i[0] if 'topstreams' not in i[0]] sort1 = [(i[0] ,i[1],i[2],i[3]) for i in z if 'Silver'in i[2] if 'p2pstreams' not in i[0] if 'sportinglive' not in i[0] if 'DAZN' not in i[1] if 'ripplestream4u' not in i[0] if 'espnonline' not in i[0] if 'papahd' not in i[0] if 'stakes100' not in i[0] if 'cr8soccer' not in i[0] if 'topstreams' not in i[0] if 'streamcheck' not in i[0]] return sort + sort1

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re page_data = client.request('https://v2.sportsurge.net/list-hockey') page_data = page_data.split('>WATCH<',1)[-1] page_data = page_data.split('<footer class=',1)[0] s = re.findall('(?s)<a href="([^"]*).*?h4>([^<]*).*?h4>.*?h4>([^<]*).*?;">([^<]*)',page_data) r = [('https://v2.sportsurge.net/'+i[0],i[1],i[2],i[3]) for i in s] return r

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re page_data = client.request('[makelist.param1]') r = re.findall('(?s)game-forecast-link MobildeGoster.*?ef=\'([^\']*).*?4>([^<]*)',page_data) sort = [(i[0],i[1]) for i in r if 'Stream East' not in i[1] if 'dudestream' not in i[1] if 'chenstream' not in i[1] if 'NbaStreams' not in i[1] if 'Livefreegame' not in i[1] if 'tvsportslive' not in i[1] if 'bilasport' not in i[1] if 'Dubz Streams' not in i[1] if 'Freetvlive1' not in i[1] if 'NoDelayStream' not in i[1] if 'Sportinglivestreamz' not in i[1] if 'Icelz ' not in i[1] if 'bestnhl.com' not in i[1] if 'papahd' not in i[1] if 'Sports News' not in i[1] if 'sportsio' not in i[1] if 'Streamos' not in i[1] if 'SoccerJumboTV' not in i[1] if 'streamhd247' not in i[1] if 'babysharkstream' not in i[1] if 'Icelz' not in i[1] if 'MyGoodStream' not in i[1] if 'Semensport' not in i[1] if 'Bilasport' not in i[1] if 'Sports24' not in i[1] if 'Yoursports Stream' not in i[1] if 'KobeStreams' not in i[1] if 'sportsway' not in i[1] if 'summerstream' not in i[1] if 'RoyStream' not in i[1] if 'BuffStreams' not in i[1] if 'Time4tv' not in i[1]] return sort

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re r = re.findall('<a class=\'btn btn-primary\' href=\'([^\']*)\'>([^<]*)', page_data) sort = [('http://www.worldcupfootball.me'+i[0],i[1]) for i in r] return sort

regex.name: m3u
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re token = client.request('http://continuum.watch/Crew/nhl.txt') nhl_auth = "|Cookie=Authorization=" + token h = re.findall('(?s)<div class="embed-responsive embed-responsive-16by9">(?:[^"]*)"(?:[^"]*)"(?:[^"]*)"(?:[^"]*)"(?:[^"]*)"(?:[^"]*)"(?:[^"]*)"(?:[^"]*)"(?:[^"]*)"(?:[^"]*)"(?:[^"]*)"([^"]*)', page_data)[0] return h + nhl_auth

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return r = re.findall('(?s)title = "([^"]*)(?:.*?f = ")([^"]*).*?datetime="([^"]*)', page_data) r = [(i[0],'http://www.720pstream.se'+i[1],i[2]) for i in r] return r

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re e = re.findall('<a class="btn btn-primary btn-xs m-1" href="([^"]*)">([^<]*)',page_data) e = [('http://www.720pstream.se'+i[0],i[1]) for i in e] return e

regex.name: m3u
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re token = client.request('http://continuum.watch/Crew/nhl.txt') nhl_auth = "|Cookie=Authorization=" + token r = re.findall('"videoUrl":"([^"]*)', page_data)[0] r = r.replace('\\','') r = r.replace('master_wired60','5600K/5600_slide') return r + nhl_auth

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re e = page_data.split('style="padding: 12px', 1)[-1] e = re.findall('data-slug="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)',e) sort =[('http://everysports.us/view/'+i[0],i[1]) for i in e] return sort

regex.name: m3u
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,base64 token = client.request('http://continuum.watch/Crew/nhl.txt') nhl_auth = "|Cookie=Authorization=" + token r = re.findall('(?s)<iframe.*?src=\'([^\']*)', page_data)[0] t = client.request(r) w = re.findall('var source = "([^"]*)', t)[0] w = w.replace('master_wired60','5600K/5600_slide') return w + nhl_auth

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re r = page_data.split('position: inherit !important', 1)[-1] r = page_data.split('Clappr Builds',1)[0] e = re.findall('<a href="([^"]*)"(?:[^>]*)>\s*([^<]*)',r) e =[(i[0],i[1]) for i in e if 'Feed' in i[1]] return e

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import control,site import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return page_data = site.request('https://daddylive.live/') page_data = page_data.split('>Ice Hockey<',1)[-1] page_data = page_data.split('>Soccer<',1)[0] e = re.findall('(?s)>([^<]*)<a href="([^"]*)', page_data) return e

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import control,client import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return site = page_data items = re.findall('(?s)float: right;">([^<]*)(?:.*?href=")([^"]*)', site) sort = [(i[0].replace('\xc3\xa9s',''),'https://sports24.stream/nhl/'+i[1].replace('\xc3\xa9s','')) for i in items] return sort

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return u = client.request('http://www.hesgoal.com/') r = re.findall('(?s)class="file(?:[^=]*)=(?:[^=]*)="([^"]*)">)([^<]*)',u) r = [(i[0],i[1],i[2],i[3]) for i in r if 'vs' in i[2] and 'NHL' in i[3]] return r

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re url = '[makelist.param1]' crewstreamer = control.cdnImport('https://bitbucket.org/threw/xmls2/raw/master/crewstreamer.xml', 'crewstreamer') crewstreamer = crewstreamer.streamer() url = crewstreamer.resolve(url) return url
